root.name: Air Conflicts: Pacific Carriers
root.description: OverviewAir Conflicts: Pacific Carriers is a flight simulator based in the Pacific Theater of WWII. You can choose between U.S. Navy or Japanese Imperial Navy. It will be released in fall 2012. You have the ability to control a entire squadron of airplanes instead of just one. It also has a 4 different multiplayer modes.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: Intel/AMD CPU (1.1GHz+)Memory: 1 GBHard Disk Space: 2 GBVideo Card: Shader 3.0 compatible graphics card with min. 256 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cSound: Sound card requiredRecommendedOS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: Intel/AMD CPU (1.8GHz+)Memory: 2 GBHard Disk Space: 2 GBVideo Card: GeForce 9x or better graphics card with min. 512 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cSound: Sound card required
